mods.abstract: ONE HUNDRED DOLLARS REWARD--Will be paid for the arrest and confinement in the Second Municipality Workhouse, of the girl ELLEN or ELIZA WILLIAMS, of a yellow color, aged about 20 years, and about 5 feet 4 inches in height--high cheek bones; seems startled when spoken to suddenly, and hesitates in her speech; had on when she left, a sun bon-net and a dark green worsted dress, and wears false hair in front; has some freckles on her face. fe14 3t
mods.note: Louisiana State University Libraries, Special Collections ( http://www.lib.lsu.edu/special )
mods.accessCondition: E-mail lsudiglib@lsu.edu with questions or comments about the collection.

Physical rights are retained by the LSU Libraries. Copyright has expired and the item is therefore in the public domain. Permission to reproduce this image must be requested through the Special Collections Department, Louisiana State University Libraries.
mods.note: Louisiana Runaway Slave Advertisements, 1836-1865, Louisiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
